name: S_4_6_2_Manage_Access_to_Public_Health_Information_Resources
title: S.4.6.2 Manage Access to Public Health Information Resources (Function)
description: Enable access to public health information resources.
purpose:
PHR Account Holder shall have access to public health information resources.

Example(s): A PHR Account Holder may want to receive general news releases from specific local, state and federal agencies. A PHR Account Holder may want to access information regarding public health resources for specific areas of interest such as birth control or hepatitis prevention.

statement.label: S.4.6.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability for a PHR Account Holder to manage a subscription to Public Health information resources.

statement.label: S.4.6.2#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to capture administrative information necessary to subscribe to Public Health Information resources.

statement.label: S.4.6.2#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render public health information resources sorted by enrollment date and category.

statement.label: S.4.6.2#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture alerts and/or notifications from public health information resources according to organizational policy and/or jurisdictional law.
